mdRecord.dcterms:description: Beth Gali and Marius Quintana, architects. Old stone quarry and civil war communal grave (1936-39). Transformed into a memorial to those killed by the Franco regime, and a mausoleum to Lluis Companys, president of Catalunya, shot here 1940. [work]
